title: Early Occult Memory Systems of the Lower Midwest: Poems
description: Winner of the National Book Critics Circle Award. B. H. Fairchild's memory systems are the collective vision of America's despairing dreamersâ€•failed baseball players, oil field laborers, a surrealist priest, college boys at a burlesque theater, the last remaining cast members of The Wizard of Oz . Looming over all is the fact and the mystery of our continued renewal.
author: B.H. Fairchild
